EzyFit Function Reference<< Prev | Next >> 
gridc
Centered cross grid.

Description 
gridc shows central cross axes. 
gridc X or gridc Y only shows the horizontal or vertical axe.
See Also 
axisc, axis0. 
 
Published output in the Help browser 
   showdemo gridc
